article_title: Democrats, Republicans clash over cigarette tax in Oklahoma

article_metadata.author: SEAN MURPHY, Associated Press

og.description: OKLAHOMA CITY (AP) — The Oklahoma House rejected a proposed $1.50-per-pack tax on cigarettes to help stave off cuts to the state's health care system, with Democrats uniting against the
